title: Share of non-performing loans held by banks in the U.S. 1995 to 2019
yAxis: Share of non-performing loans in total loans
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Share of non-performing loans in total loans. In total the number of data points it has is 25.
In general Share of non-performing loans in total loans has stayed the same over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year '08 and '09.
The highest Share of non-performing loans in total loans, of value 5.3 was reached at Year '10
The lowest Share of non-performing loans in total loans, of value 0.73 was reported at Year '06
min_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Share of non-performing loans in total loans. In total the number of data points it has is 25.
Overall Share of non-performing loans in total loans has decreased over the Year.

max_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of non-performing loans in total loans, containing a total of 25 data points.
Overall Share of non-performing loans in total loans has decreased over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year '08 and '09.
The highest Share of non-performing loans in total loans, of value 5.3 was reached at Year '10
The lowest Share of non-performing loans in total loans, of value 0.73 was reported at Year '06
The line rapidly increased by 118.81% from Year '07 to '08, and lastly, increased by 112.67% from Year '08 to '09.
